option1: 1. What are the arrangements made for supply and distribution of stamps in the state?
option2: 2. Where the stamp papers are adhesive stamps are sold to the citizens?
option3: 3. Where can citizen get the information about the licensed Stamp Vendors?
option4: 4. Where can citizen get the information about the Franking Machine Holders?
option5: 5. Can we track the Stamp to whom it was sold?

text: 1.The District Registrars / I.R.Os send their demand for stamps to the General Stamp Office.<hr>2.The General Stamp Office consolidates the indent and sends the consolidated indents to the Central Stamp Stores at Nasik and the Security Printing Press at Hyderabad for supply of stamps to the Nodal Stock Point at Vijayawada, which is under the charge of District Registrar (Market Value & Audit), Vijayawada.<hr>3.On receipt of the stamps, the District Registrar (MV&Audit), Vijayawada distributes them to all the Distict Registrars / IROs, as per their demand.<hr>4.The District Registrars/ IROs, in turn,distribute them to the Joint Sub- Registrars under their control.<hr>5.The Joint Sub-Registrars keep some of the stamp papers and adhesive stamps with them for direct sale to public through the counters in their offices and distribute the remaining stamp papers to the licensed Stamp Vendors.
